com.philips.pins.shinelib

Class SHNCentral.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.pins.shinelib.SHNCentral.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    SHNCentral

    public static class SHNCentral.Builder
extends Object
    The SHNCentral.Builder is used to build a SHNCentral object.

      • Builder

        public Builder(android.content.Context context)
        Create a SHNCentral.Builder.

    • Method Detail

      • setHandler

        public SHNCentral.Builder setHandler(android.os.Handler handler)
        Add a handler to the SHNCentral you are currently building.

        This handler will be used to post callbacks from Bluelib on.

        Parameters:
        handler - a Handler to use for callbacks
        Returns:
        Builder to chain more calls

      • showPopupIfBLEIsTurnedOff

        public SHNCentral.Builder showPopupIfBLEIsTurnedOff(Boolean showPopupIfBLEIsTurnedOff)
        Shows a popup if for some reason Bluetooth was not enabled.
        Parameters:
        showPopupIfBLEIsTurnedOff - set to true if you want the popup to show
        Returns:
        Builder to chain more calls

      • setSharedPreferencesProvider

        public SHNCentral.Builder setSharedPreferencesProvider(SharedPreferencesProvider sharedPreferencesProvider)
        Set a custom SharedPreferencesProvider for SHNCentral to use.
        Parameters:
        sharedPreferencesProvider - custom SharedPreferencesProvider for SHNCentral to use
        Returns:
        Builder to chain more calls

      • migrateFromDefaultProviderToCustom

        public SHNCentral.Builder migrateFromDefaultProviderToCustom(Boolean migrateFromDefaultProviderToCustom)
        Set to true to indicate that data needs to be migrated.

        Data that was previously stored in SharedPreferences will be migrated to the new custom SharedPreferencesProvider that was set using setSharedPreferencesProvider(SharedPreferencesProvider). If migration was previously completed to the custom SharedPreferencesProvider it will not be done again.

        Parameters:
        migrateFromDefaultProviderToCustom - set to true to indicate migration is wanted
        Returns:
        Builder to chain more calls

      • create

        public SHNCentral create()
                  throws SHNBluetoothHardwareUnavailableException
        Finish this Builder by creating the actual SHNCentral using previously specified parameters.
        Returns:
        the created SHNCentral
        Throws:
        SHNBluetoothHardwareUnavailableException - if no BlueTooth hardware was available on the device
